law.catch_line: The Commission may adopt and enforce regulations to carry out this title....

text.section: The Commission may adopt and enforce regulations to carry out this title.

section.section:
The executive director shall:
compile and keep in the office of the Commission a set of current regulations adopted under this title; and
make a copy of the regulations for anyone who asks for one.
The Commission may set a fee to cover the cost of making and mailing a copy of the current regulations.
